modules.title: TareUhhhhhh
modules.subtitle:
A fun-loving nerd that loves to build new things and improve on already existing, awesome sites. My ultimate goal is to work with a video game company - creating fun, new games!
My previous experience working for a CRM software company, in multiple roles and departments, provides a great background for entry-level, front-end web developer roles. I'm local to the Kansas City area, but open to remote positions!
